word: The Spirit was not given\97nor can it ever be bestowed\97to supersede the Bible; for the Scriptures explicitly state that the Word of God is the standard by which all teaching and experience must be tested. Says the apostle John, \93Believe not every spirit, but try the spirits whether they are of God; because many false prophets are gone out into the world.\94 1 John 4:1. And Isaiah declares, \93To the law and to the testimony; if they speak not according to this word, it is because there is no light in them.\94 Isaiah 8:20.
